thread.title: BRIEF-Gendis Announces Shareholder Approval Of Share Consolidation, Provides Update On Completion Of Going Private Transaction

title: BRIEF-Gendis Announces Shareholder Approval Of Share Consolidation, Provides Update On Completion Of Going Private Transaction

organizations.name: completion of going private transaction reuters

text:
April 9, 2018 / 6:45 PM / in 16 minutes BRIEF-Gendis Announces Shareholder Approval Of Share Consolidation, Provides Update On Completion Of Going Private Transaction Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 10 (Reuters) - Gendis Inc: 
* GENDIS ANNOUNCES SHAREHOLDER APPROVAL OF SHARE CONSOLIDATION AND PROVIDES UPDATE ON COMPLETION OF GOING PRIVATE TRANSACTION 
* CORPANTICIPATES THAT ITS SHARES WILL BE FORMALLY DELISTED FROM TORONTO STOCK EXCHANGE SHORTLY Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
